title: FS: T cards (signed T206's, T206 ghosts, T212 Obak "Just Right")

posts.post_title: FS: T cards (signed T206's, T206 ghosts, T212 Obak "Just Right")
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
For sale.  

NOW LISTENING TO OFFERS on all the cards.  I could also be up for trading if interested in something.

Prices include first class shipping with delivery confirmation

Looking for check or money order.

Email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

Emails have priority. First to contact me with intent to purchase gets the card(s).  If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

Thanks for looking.


T206 Bill Graham SGC 20 (Ghost).  Has a slight ghost image on the front.  $25/OBO

[IMG]http://i84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/1909-11T206GrahamBillStLouisGHOST.jpg[/IMG]
